body.name: ACURE Ultra Hydrating Green Juice Face Cleanser - Day & Night Facial Cleansing Foam, Intense Moisture, Deep Cleanses Thirsty Dry Skin - All Natural Supergreens & Adaptogens Blend - 100% Vegan, 4 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 8 mins
features: DEEP HYDRATION - Get incredibly moist and refreshed skin with our Ultra Hydrating Green Juice Cleanser. It's packed with special ingredients like ashwagandha, holy basil, reishi, turmeric, kale, spinach, neem, and spirulina that deeply nourish and revitalize your skin.

NATURAL GREENS & SKIN BOOSTERS - the power of supergreens meets adaptogens in this facial cleanser. Enjoy the benefits of kale, spinach, neem, spirulina, ashwagandha, holy basil, and reishi, a superfood boost, blend perfectly to purify, and rejuvenate your skin.

SPECIALIZED FOR THIRSTY SKIN - Designed specifically for thirsty and dry skin types, this cleanser the ultimate hydration solution. This skincare is formulated to moisture, replenish and refresh, leaving your skin feeling pampered and rejuvenated.

SMOOTHIE-TO-FOAM TEXTURE CLEANSER - The smoothie-to-foam formula transforms and lifts away dirts, makeup, and excess oil, leaving your skin feeling deeply cleansed and refreshed. The foam works its way into every nook and cranny, ensuring a thorough cleanse.

100% VEGAN & FREE FROM HARSH CHEMICALS - Our formula is free from parabens, sulfates, formaldehyde, and other harmful substances. Enjoy gentle, effective cleansing without compromising your skin's healthy and natural glow
body.description: OUR STORY: We are skin & hair wellness enthusiasts who believe in the power of purity to uplift the way you feel. We want to see every action you take lead to a stronger, healthier, more vibrant you that is ready to kick ass and take names. INGREDIENTS: We source the highest quality ingredients for your skin. No parabens, sulfates, formaldehyde, paraffin, mineral oil or animal testing allowed! SUPER POSITIVE EFFECT: Our products always uplift, for skin & hair that performs at its absolute best and a planet that flourishes. THOUGHTFUL INGENUITY: We mix together the perfect combination of super nutrients for powerful products. SHEER PASSION: We are on a mission to steer people toward better for you and accessible skin care & hair care that will allow them to shine their brightest. OUR MISSION is to take skin & hair from blah to brilliant by boosting their performance with powerful combination of amazing ingredients.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #39,277 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #572 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Improved Skin—Strong Scent
reviews.reviewText: Have really been enjoying using this product. I feel it has made my skin a lot smoother and cleaner. The only thing is the smell—I wasn't used to it so it was overpowering at first (kind of smells like those flower shops x10.. very floral?), but I've now gotten used to it and it doesn't bother me anymore. I do need to moisturize after using this because my skin still gets dry and tight if I don't. I look forward to trying the other facial cleansers from Acure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Eye Cream
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many eye creams and this is one of the best, it moisturizes very well leaving area under the eyes look brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and cleansing
reviews.reviewText: Love how it foams up and leaves my skin feeling hydrated. Obviously still moisturize your face after but this does a good job of making your skin clean and not stripping away any moisture. I have dry skin for reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never use anything else
reviews.reviewText: My skin is super sensitive and dry. I’ve tried many hydrating products that leave my face feeling the same, if not worse. I used the pink one for awhile, I do really like that one as well but the green one works best for my skin. I don’t think I’ll ever use anything else. It doesn’t take much and the bottle will last you quite awhile. I absolutely love it and feel good about putting it on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's okay, very milky...
reviews.reviewText: It is very milky and pours out fast. I haven't noticed a positive or negative change in my skin so I think it's maintaining or not really having an effect - which may be fine! I probably won't order again but I love my other ACURE products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing on eczema flare up
reviews.reviewText: Changes in the formula of my previous cleanser made me look for something new. I have tried Acure's shampoo and conditioner and loved those products. So I felt relatively safe trying this cleanser. It's been a lifesaver!It arrived right before what has been the worst eczema flare up I've ever had. This cleanser isn't heavy. The scent is mild yet pleasant. It's also soothing and somehow refreshing. I'm excited to try more products from this line!One note of caution: my former cleanser came in a pump bottle. One pump dispensed the right amount. It's been a while since I've used a squeeze bottled cleanser. The first time I used it, I ended up dispensing a lot. A small amount of this cleanser does the job though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: One of the very very few products I can stand having on my skin. Doesn’t sting or dry my skin out. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its and okay cleanser
reviews.reviewText: As someone who wears a lot of make up, this facial cleanser is okay. It’s not a deep clean so I use a make up remover balm first and toner after. If I’m washing my face without having any make up on then this face washer is decent. Leaves my skin feeling smooth.My only issue is it burns my nostrils when I use it in the shower. Never had this problem before
